values.start_message:
Hi! 
I'm Boneroller, a dice-rolling bot. You can roll dices through the inline keyboard. Type @boneroller and you will see the options available. 
I also understand commands: 
 - /start - displays this message 
 - /help - displays more detailed information 
 - /language - allows you to change the language 
 - /credits - displays information about the creator
values.help_message:
To roll a dice, type @boneroller in the input field and select the dice you want to roll. The result will be sent to the current chat immediately. 
Available commands: 
 - /start - displays a welcome message 
 - /help - displays this message 
 - /language - allows you to change the language 
 - /credits - information about the creator
